description: ESG invests in equity securities of U.S. companies in order to replicate the S&P 500 Scored & Screened Index. The index is a broad-based, market-cap-weighted index that is designed to measure the performance of companies in the S&P 500 (the "broader index") meeting certain environmental, social and governance (ESG) criteria, while maintaining similar overall industry weights as the broader index.
name: ESG Invesco S&P 500 ESG Index ETF - CAD
